function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of incomplete data capture due to studies not using specified search terms","Impact":"Missed potential research outcomes and conclusions","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of specified search terms in research studies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academics","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Potential for transmission of COVID-19 in the process of real-world evidence research","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease among researchers and participants","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols, remote data collection, and virtual collaboration","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, study participants","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate categorization of study topics and designs leading to misinterpretation of data","Impact":"Misguided conclusions and recommendations based on misclassified studies","Mitigation":"Implement standardized classification criteria and involve multiple reviewers for categorization","Technologies":"Automated categorization algorithms, data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, reviewers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"}]}
